      • fire

        public boolean fire(int rowFire,
                    int colFire,
                    java.lang.String director)
        This method makes the fire that the user type in the coordinates 

        Matrix must be created, thats mean, playing
        
 

        Node to fire must be on the matrix size
        
 

        Node must be on a lateral node of the matrix
        Parameters:
        rowFire - as integer of the row node to fire
        colFire - as integer of the column node to fire
        director - String as the direction (vertical or horizontal) to fire, only when are corners
        Returns:
        found as boolean if the fire was executed or not post:

        public boolean locate(int rowLoc,

        Matrix must be created, thats mean, playing
        
 

        Mirror to find must be on the matrix size, not out of it coordinates
        Parameters:

        colLoc - as integer of the column node to localize
        director - String as the direction (left or right) f the mirror
        Returns:
        a boolean if in the coordinates type by the user and direction was a mirror or not post:
